Name: Unturned
Overview: This Docker will download and install SteamCMD. It will also install Unturned and run it (if you want to install Rocket Mod set the Variable 'Install Rocket Mod' to 'true' without quotes).

TCP1 - Game Port.Name: TCP1 - Game Port
TCP1 - Game Port.Description:
TCP Game Port (if you need another port, please delete this entry and create a new TCP Port with the required port number, also don't forget to change it in the 'Show more settings ...' section below)
ATTENTION: Don't forget that you must set 2 other ports GAME_PORT +1 & GAME_PORT +2

GAME_ID.Name: GAME_ID
GAME_ID.Description:
The GAME_ID that the container download at startup.
(https://developer.valvesoftware.com/wiki/Dedicated_Servers_List)

GAME_PARAMS.Name: GAME_PARAMS
GAME_PARAMS.Description: Enter your start up commands for the server.

Steam-Username.Name: Steam-Username
Steam-Username.Description: Your Steam username goes here if you want to install a game that needs a valid account, otherwise leave it blank (ATTENTION: You have to disable Steam Guard).

Validate Installation.Name: Validate Installation
Validate Installation.Description: Set the Variable to 'true' if you want to validate the installation otherwise leave it blank.

Steam-Password.Name: Steam-Password
Steam-Password.Description: Your Steam password goes here if you want to install a game that needs a valid account, otherwise leave it blank (ATTENTION: You have to disable Steam Guard).

Install Rocket Mod.Name: Install Rocket Mod
Install Rocket Mod.Description: Set to 'true' (without quotes) to install Rocket Mod otherwise leave blank

Rocket Mod Force Update.Name: Rocket Mod Force Update
Rocket Mod Force Update.Description:
If you want to force a update of Rocket Mod set to 'true' (without quotes)
ATTENTION: All files in the 'Modules' & 'Scripts' folder will be overwritten backup the files bevor doing that!

Rocket Mod Download URL.Name: Rocket Mod Download URL
Rocket Mod Download URL.Description: Only change if you are know what you are doing

Base Game Port.Name: Base Game Port
Base Game Port.Description: If you change this setting don't forget to delete the gameport above and create 3 entries for TCP and 3 entries for UDP (GAME_PORT +2 TCP & GAME_PORT UDP +2)
